query:
-- Add outbound flight (Sep 1, 22:00 Israel → Sep 2, 01:10 Bratislava)
INSERT INTO transportation (tripId, type, origin, destination, departureDate, departureTime, arrivalDate, arrivalTime, confirmationNumber, price, currency, url, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (
  30001,
  'flight',
  'Israel',
  'Bratislava Airport (BTS)',
  1725217200000,
  '22:00',
  1725228600000,
  '01:10',
  '',
  0,
  'ILS',
  '',
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP() * 1000,
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP() * 1000
);

-- Add return flight (Sep 9, 17:00 Bratislava → Israel)
INSERT INTO transportation (tripId, type, origin, destination, departureDate, departureTime, arrivalDate, arrivalTime, confirmationNumber, price, currency, url, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (
  30001,
  'flight',
  'Bratislava Airport (BTS)',
  'Israel',
  1725894000000,
  '17:00',
  1725904800000,
  '20:00',
  '',
  0,
  'ILS',
  '',
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP() * 1000,
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP() * 1000
);
